text: Michael John Kells Fleetwood (born 24 June 1947) is a British musician and actor, best known for his role as the drummer and co-founder of the rock band Fleetwood Mac. ==Discography== ===Fleetwood Mac=== ;Studio albums # Peter's Green Fleetwood Mac (1968) # Mr. Wonderful (1968) # Then Play On (1969) # Kiln House (1970) # Future Games (1971) # Bare Trees (1972) # Penguin (1973) # Mystery to Me (1973) # Heroes Are Find to Find (1974) # Fleetwood Mac (1975) # Rumours (1977) # Tusk (1979) # Mirage (1982) # Tango in the Night (1987) # Behind the Mask (1990) # Time (1995) # Say You Will (2003) ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:English rock drummers Category:English movie actors Category:People from Cornwall Category:Fleetwood Mac members
title: Mick Fleetwood
